name: 2021 5th International Conference on Communication and Information Systems
content: Publicationï¼š After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the Conference Proceedings by IEEE, and sent to be reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex and Scopus. - All accepted papers in previous conference have been indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus already. ICCIS 2021 has entered IEEE conference list.
